name: Carrot Hunter
description:
Carrot Hunter is cute and funny platformer game about brave rabbit in sombrero. Help him return all the carrots to his home village and family.

Wild animals stole from rabbits all carrot! You should take it! Jump on enemies and platforms, also you can find secret places and collect carrot.

Features:

  • 18 levels.
  • 3 types of enemies.
  • A lot of carrots!
